data.title: Aggressive Turret For Mid Control
data.description: This is an aggressive placement of utility that allows you to shift off of the B Site and fight for Mid with an extra crossfire. It is recommended to use this set up when fighting with a teammate.

data.title: Full Utility B Site Hold
data.description: Use this powerful setup to anchor the B Site with relative ease, as you have a kill set up for Lane and a Turret that spots for information.

data.title: Alarmbot For Ascent A Door
data.description: Use this strong kill set up to punish Attackers for trying to close the door, or players attacking the site from Tree.
